ai-ps1.3:144.2_0: When breathing in, he trains in contemplating impermanence; when breathing out, he trains in contemplating impermanence.
ai-ps1.3:144.4_0: These are the eight impingements for quiet.
ai-ps1.3:145.1_0: What is the one-free knowledge and freedom?
ai-ps1.3:145.2_0: Because they have given up the attainment of the path, they give up the embodiment view that arises and take pleasure in them because they are asking the knowledge of freedom.
ai-ps1.3:145.3_0: doubt arises in the underlying tendencies of views, doubt arises; and when they’ve given up the conceit ‘I am’. ...
ai-ps1.3:145.4_0: When he has given up the underlying tendencies of sensual desire, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-ps1.3:145.5_0: When he has gone beyond the underlying tendencies of sensual desire, repulsion, views, doubt, conceit, desire to be reborn, and ignorance.
ai-ps1.3:145.6_0: Their underlying tendencies of conceit, desire to be reborn, ignorance, knowledge of the conceit ‘I am’, and the underlying tendencies are given up.
ai-ps1.3:145.8_0: These are the sixteen bases for immersion due to mindfulness of breathing. These are the two hundred and fifty number.
ai-ps1.3:145.9_0: The story of mindfulness of breathing is finished.
